values:
okkk~ I got this in my sephora (make-up place)'s weekly update on my email today:

Music Series: GET YOUR GROOVE ON, UTADA'S LISTENING PARTY
Please join Sephora and Island Def Jam for an evening of beauty-full music with international pop sensation, Utada. Come rock out to tunes from her new album "This Is The One", then listen to the stories behind the music from the artist herself. While you're there, score some makeup tips and go home with a pretty special gift.
 
March 24, Hollywood, CA   Sephora Hollywood & Highland 323-462-6898

...Utada Hikaru and Sephora collaboration + new US release album...?! not sure what to think of this 0_o
Sorry ppl, friends only ^^ (image from silvermoon-chan on quizilla.com, editing by )
